Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at The Palace Hotel in Torquay (English Riviera), you'll be minutes from Kents Cavern Prehistoric Caves and close to Torquay Museum. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Babbacombe Beach and Bygones Victorian Museum.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 141 guestrooms.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Enjoy a range of recreational amenities, including an outdoor pool, an indoor pool, and a fitness center. Additional features include complimentary wireless Internet access, wedding services, and tour/ticket assistance.

Dining
Enjoy a meal at a restaurant, or stay in and take advantage of the hotel's 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Event facilities at this hotel consist of conference space and meeting rooms. Free self parking is available onsite.


Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is 11 AM
Enjoy a meal at a restaurant, or stay in and take advantage of the hotel's 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Enjoy a range of recreational amenities, including an outdoor pool, an indoor pool, and a fitness center. Additional features include complimentary wireless Internet access, wedding services, and tour/ticket assistance.
Make yourself at home in one of the 141 guestrooms.

With a stay at The Palace Hotel in Torquay (English Riviera), you'll be minutes from Kents Cavern Prehistoric Caves and close to Torquay Museum. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Babbacombe Beach and Bygones Victorian Museum.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Kents Cavern Prehistoric Caves - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Torquay Museum - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Babbacombe Beach - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi
Bygones Victorian Museum - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi
Babbacombe Model Village and Gardens - 1.6 km / 1 mi
Meadfoot Beach - 1.7 km / 1 mi
Living Coasts - 2 km / 1.2 mi
Princess Theatre - 2 km / 1.3 mi
Abbey Sands - 2.3 km / 1.4 mi
Riviera International Conference Centre - 2.5 km / 1.5 mi
Torre Abbey - 2.6 km / 1.6 mi
Paignton Beach - 5.4 km / 3.3 mi
Goodrington Sands Beach - 6.3 km / 3.9 mi
Paignton Zoo - 7.3 km / 4.6 mi
Berry Head - 8.2 km / 5.1 mi

The preferred airport for The Palace Hotel is Exeter (EXT-Exeter Intl.) - 29.5 km / 18.3 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
